name: GetPVarInt
notes: Variables aren't reset until after OnPlayerDisconnect is called, so the values are still accessible in OnPlayerDisconnect.
description: Gets an integer player variable's value.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player whose player variable to get.

params_body.name: varname
params_body.description: The name of the player variable (case-insensitive). Assigned in SetPVarInt.

return_values: The integer value of the specified player variable. It will still return 0 if the variable is not set, or the player does not exist.
related_fn:
SetPVarInt: Set an integer for a player variable.
 SetPVarString: Set a string for a player variable.
 GetPVarString: Get the previously set string from a player variable.
 SetPVarFloat: Set a float for a player variable.
 GetPVarFloat: Get the previously set float from a player variable.
 DeletePVar: Delete a player variable.
